item.title: Teaching Factory Physics Flow Benchmarking with R and Many-Objective Visuals
item.description: Teaching MBA / MBE classes to seasoned managers is challenging. Itâ€™s important to bring new thoughts to the table, and at the same time to provide a fundamental basis for experienced people with diverse backgrounds. One of the strategies I found to overcome these obstacles this week was to use a new analysis framework (in my case, Factory Physics concepts) and use that to challenge their views about existing frames they already master.
